liarGameData.explanation: A2 learners must distinguish between expressing opinions ('I think', 'In my opinion') and stating facts.
liarGameData.practice: Opinion: 'I think this is good' vs Fact: 'This is good'. Use 'I think/believe/feel' for opinions.
liarGameData.tip: Always use opinion markers (I think, in my opinion, I believe) when expressing personal views!
